name: AuraSmart
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Aura Smart is at the forefront of innovation in home security, offering safer, easier, and smarter solutions. Our newest devices are now compatible with Alexa for enhanced convenience.
With the Aura Smart skill for Alexa, you can comfortably relax on your sofa while you watch live streams from your Aura Smart cameras directly on your Amazon Alexa devices, like the Echo Show.

To get started, simply follow these steps:

1. Download the Aura Smart App from the App Store or Google Play, set up your camera, and ensure it remains online and operational.
2. Open the Alexa App, search for the Aura Smart Skill, and enable it to link your camera with your Alexa account. Then, locate your camera in the app.
3. Use voice commands such as "Alexa, show the living room" to view live feeds and ensure everything is secure in your home.

Compatible models with Alexa include:

Aura Smart models:
* Video Doorbell Camera
* Battery Camera
* Indoor Camera
* Floodlight Camera,
* Wired Camera

For any inquiries, please feel free to contact us at support@aurasmart.com
